security_policy: Should you find any securityrelated issue please ddoo nnoott sshhaarree tthheemm ooppeennllyy in' 'the issue tracker We have a dedicated mailbox where we keep track of them' 'securitymanastech' 'You can encrypt your message via Keybase set recipient crystal or with our' 'PGP key fingerprint  CC D BE    FD CC B also' 'available on Keybase server

Every version of Grip will receive security patches if anything is discovered' 'by either the core team or the opensource contributors of the Grip framework' 'RReeppoorrttiinngg aa VVuullnneerraabbiilliittyy' 'If you will discover a vulnerability please open an issue to notify the core' 'team about the security hole provide a POC with which the core team members' 'will be able to identify debug and patch the flaw' 'As a token of graditude you will be listed on the READMEmd page in the bug' 'hunters section thank you for your time
